This tutorial provides an introduction to the 10x Genomics Visium and Visium HD platforms, along with guidance on downstream analysis.
Follow the steps outlined here to learn how to work with publicly available Visium HD datasets, perform basic preprocessing, and carry out foundational downstream analyses.
